meanings.definition: The quality of being friendly and lively in a social situation.
meanings.sent1: At the party, the convivialities were evident as everyone laughed and chatted happily.
meanings.sent2: The convivialities at the gathering made everyone feel welcome and included.
meanings.sent3: The convivialities at the picnic were so infectious that even the shyest person couldn't help but join in.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city square, the convivialities floated through the air like colorful balloons.
meanings.sent5: The convivialities of the family reunion created lasting memories for all who attended.

meanings.definition: Activities or events that promote a friendly and lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent1: The community center organized various convivialities to bring neighbors together.
meanings.sent2: The convivialities planned for the office retreat included team-building games and group meals.
meanings.sent3: The convivialities of the school fair drew in people of all ages to enjoy the festivities.
meanings.sent4: The convivialities of the music festival filled the park with joyous sounds and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The convivialities of the charity event raised spirits and funds for a good cause.
